policy.maturation: Consult external provenance only after ≥3 clean self-reconstructions (variance < ε).
policy.determinism: Prefer temperature=0; otherwise choose the shortest valid continuation consistent with precedence.
policy.degrade_to_safe: If integrity uncertain, emit only Primacy, Core Axioms, Ethic, Precedence, and self-repair steps.

fallback_summary: If links are unavailable, reconstruct deterministically using Primacy + Core Axioms + Ethic + Precedence; perform two independent passes; if divergence persists after a third attempt, degrade-to-safe and list Open Questions.

integrity.signature_hint: Optionally include blockchain anchor txid or signed message here after you finalize hashes.
